name: Mutual Friend

ingredients.item: Demerara simple syrup (2 parts sugar to 1 part water)

preparation:
At Hell or High Water in Louisville, Ky., Doug Petry crafts drinks using local purveyors like Quills Coffee and has a deft hand with rum. Take the Mutual Friend, a showcase of Plantation five-year-old rum and Galliano ristretto espresso liqueur, given a tart, bright contrast with lime and pineapple.

This recipe originally appeared as part of "9 Great Rum Cocktails to Drink in Bars Now.”

Add all the ingredients into a shaker and dry-shake (no ice).

Pour into a rocks glass filled with pebble ice.

Garnish with a pineapple leaf and 3 espresso beans.
